mapper.select: SELECT exam_id, user_id, exam_name, exam_date, reminder, create_at FROM t_exam WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY exam_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exam (user_id, exam_name, exam_date, reminder) VALUES (#{userId}, #{examName}, #{examDate}, #{reminder})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_exam WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND user_id = #{userId}
